price: 57. Waxay ku lahaan midho gudaheeda waxayna lahaan waxay doonaanba.
arabic: لَهُمۡ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٞ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā fākihatun walahum mā yaddaʿūna
